searchmethod: termsearch <- function(lookup, terms) {stringr::str_detect(lookup, stringr::regex(paste(terms, collapse = '|'), ignore_case = TRUE))}; initial <- dplyr::filter(DATA, termsearch(COLUMN, SEARCHTERMS)); excluded <- dplyr::filter(initial, termsearch(COLUMN, EXCLUSIONTERMS); final <- dplyr::setdiff(inital, excluded)

searchterms: repeated rapid eye movement sleep interruptions
disorders of initiating and maintaining sleep
Other sleep stage or arousal dysfunction
Rapid eye movement sleep behavior disorder
Nonorganic disorder of the sleep-wake schedule
Non-organic disorder of the sleep-wake schedule
